כִּ֡י <WH3588> ki for הֵם֩ <WH1992> hem with וּמִקְנֵיהֶ֨ם <WH4735> u-mik-nei-Hem with their cattle יַעֲל֜וּ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu For they came up וְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH168> ve-'o-ho-lei-Hem, and their tents; יָבֹאוּ ya-vo-'u כוּבָ֤אוּ <WH935> u-Va-'u came קכְדֵֽי־ <WH1767> che-dei- as אַרְבֶּה֙ <WH697> 'ar-Beh grasshoppers לָרֹ֔ב <WH7230> la-Ro, for multitude וְלָהֶ֥ם ve-la-Hem וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1581> ve-lig-mal-lei-Hem [for] both they and their camels אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein were without מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> mis-Par; were without number וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they entered בָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz into the land לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <WH7843> le-sha-cha-Tah. to destroy

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> 'e-Lav then גִּדְעוֹן֙ <WH1439> gid-'On And Gideon בִּ֣י <WH994> bi unto him Oh אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni, my Lord וְיֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> ve-Yesh if יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu, us וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> ve-Lam-mah why מְצָאַ֖תְנוּ <WH4672> me-tza-'At-nu be with us why then is all this befallen כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- has all זֹ֑את <WH2063> Zot; to us וְאַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> ve-'ai-Yeh and where כָֽל־ <WH3605> chol are all נִפְלְאֹתָ֡יו <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tav us;and where [be] all his miracles אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which סִפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> sip-pe-ru- told לָ֨נוּ La-nu אֲבוֹתֵ֜ינוּ <WH1> a-vo-Tei-nu which our fathers לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, us of saying הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> ha-Lo not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim Egypt הֶעֱלָ֣נוּ <WH5927> he-'e-La-nu bring us up יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, Did not the LORD וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah henceforth נְטָשָׁ֣נוּ <WH5203> ne-ta-Sha-nu hath forsaken יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖נוּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Ne-nu us and delivered בְּכַף־ <WH3709> be-chaf- us into the hands מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> mid-Yan. of the Midianites
